name: LSG_STAGE_SEQSTUDIOFLEXDX
0:
”Alexa, open d. x. instrument”
”Alexa, tell d. x. instrument to open run modules”
”Alexa, tell d. x. instrument to show library”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: d. x. instrument
des:
This skill provides customers to interact with out genetic analyzer instruments.
It includes generic utterances like volume increase, volume decrease, date, time etc.,
It includes basic commands like show consumable screen, library screens, etc.,
It also includes conversations like plate setup with detailed instructions.

Here are a few one-short utterances samples to enjoy the skill.
- If you want to view consumables screen, just say: "Alexa, ask d.x. instrument to show consumables"
- If you want to view library screen, just say: "Alexa, ask d.x. instrument to show library"
- If you want to view run modules screen, just say: "Alexa, ask d.x. instrument to open run modules"
- If you want to view dyeset screen, just say: "Alexa, ask d.x. instrument to go to dyesets"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
